title: 52 perch land to be sold in Kohuwala with wide access road
details:
This 52 perch property is situated in a prime location just off Kohuwala Junction and is divided into two rectangular shaped blocks of lands. The property has dual access via 25 feet wide roads and currently has an old warehouse and a house. The land is accessible from both Colombo - Horana road and Stanley Tilakarathna Mawatha and conveniently located close to banks, restaurants, supermarkets, shops, schools, fuel stations, gyms, and pubs.

The property is being sold for the land value and already has 3 phase electricity, main line water connecting to the existing buildings. This is an ideal investment opportunity for property developers or to use for a commercial or residential purposes. The property would also be appropriate for a warehouse or factory given the current buildings.
